cards.name: Serene Grasslands
cards.ability: There may be up to 10 copies of this Ruin in your Explore Deck.

cards.name: Windy Wheatfields
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: Can not be attacked by Heroes or Minions not in adjacent Ruins.

cards.name: Empty Fields
cards.ability: Heroes and Minions with Stealth can not enter this Ruin while it is occupied.

cards.name: Overgrown Cornfields
cards.ability: Exit Penalty: Requires 2 Movement to exit.

cards.name: Rolling Hills
cards.ability: Entry Penalty: Requires 2 Movement to enter.

cards.name: Withered Farmlands
cards.ability: Occupy Penalty: If occupied for greater than 2 turns, at end of turn loss 1 Health.

cards.name: Gentralia Settlement
cards.ability: Entry Bonus: Gain Fortify until exiting Gentralia Settlement. This effect can only add Fortify once, but can stack with other Fortify.

cards.name: Gentralia Outpost
cards.ability: Entry Bonus: Choose one of the following: Regain 1 Helath OR Regain 1 Movement

cards.name: Gentralia Township
cards.ability: Human Combatants in this Ruin gain +1 Attack and Blitz until end of turn.

cards.name: The Long Stone Road
cards.ability: This Ruin and all Legally Connected adjacent Ruins do not require Movement to enter or exit.

cards.name: Tranquil Clearing
cards.ability: There may be up to 10 copies of this Ruin in your Explore Deck.

cards.name: Pine Grove
cards.ability: Entry Penalty: Loss Stealth until end of turn.

cards.name: Reclaimed Lumberyard
cards.ability: Exit Penalty: Requires 2 Movement to exit.

cards.name: Hazy Oaks
cards.ability: Exit Bonus: Gain Stealth until end of turn.

cards.name: Wild Orchard
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: At end of turn regain 1 Health if they did not Attack. This Bonus can not raise their Health above its printed value.

cards.name: Bristlegrowth Vines
cards.ability:
Entry Penalty: If Defense is less than 4, gain 1 Bleeding Counter. 
 Exit Penalty: If Defense is less than 4, gain 1 Bleeding Counter.

cards.name: Farring’Oak Treeline
cards.ability: Entry Penalty: Requires 2 Movement to enter.

cards.name: Elvish Nation Bridgecity
cards.ability: Wood Elves Combatants in this Ruin gain +1 Attack, +1 Defense, and +1 Speed until end of turn.

cards.name: Elvish Nation Watchtower
cards.ability: At the beginning of the Combat Step all Heroes and Minions with Range:1 in this Ruin gain Range +1 until end of turn.

cards.name: The Mother Oak of Farring’Oak
cards.ability:
Entry Penalty: Requires 2 Movement to enter. Lose all remaining Movement. 
Exit Penalty: Requires 2 Movement to exit. Lose all remaining Movement.

cards.name: Placid Pond
cards.ability: There may be up to 10 copies of this Ruin in your Explore Deck.

cards.name: Quicksink Lake
cards.ability: Occupy Penalty: If Defense is greater than 4, at the end of turn take 1 damage.

cards.name: Brine Draw Lagoon
cards.ability:
Entry Bonus: Gain +1 Defense until end of turn. 
Entry Penalty: Gain -1 Attack until end of turn.

cards.name: Seaside Loch
cards.ability: If there are 3 or more Heroes or Minions in this Ruin at the end of your turn you may Recharge up to 2 Relics.

cards.name: Isolated Pond
cards.ability: At the beginning of each turn, if only one Hero or Minion occupies this Ruin, they regain all Health. Exit Penalty: Lose all remaining Movement.

cards.name: River Network Node
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: If this Ruin is Legally Connected to only Lakes, Wetlands, or Islands this Hero or Minion gains Swimming until end of turn.

cards.name: Glizakill Riverstation
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: All Heroes or Minions with Lakecraft gain +1 Movement.

cards.name: Glizakill Trading Port
cards.ability: Merfolk Occupy Bonus: Once during your Summoning Step, you may sacrifice one Relic to search your Adventure Deck for a non-Mythical Relic with a lower Echo cost and place it into your Relic Hold with no Charge Counters on it.

cards.name: Glizakill Dam City
cards.ability: Connection Effect: When Legally Connected to any non-Lake Ruin remove all Terrain types from that Ruin and it becomes a Lake.

cards.name: The Red Waters
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: One occupying Hero or Minion gains Spell Focus and Caster.

cards.name: Mellow Wetlands
cards.ability: There may be up to 10 copies of this Ruin in your Explore Deck.

cards.name: Algae-coat Bog
cards.ability: Entry Bonus: Gain +1 Defense and -1 Speed for each Wetland Legally Connected to this Ruin until end of turn.

cards.name: Decayed Growth Mire
cards.ability: When the first Hero or Minion dies in this Ruin this Ruin gains “Occupy Bonus: Regain 1 Health”

cards.name: Reed-Farm Swamp
cards.ability: If  a Defender is in this Ruin when a Range:1 Attacker declares to attack them the Attacker takes 1 Damage and Speed becomes 1.

cards.name: Driftvine Fen
cards.ability: Entry Penalty: Gain +1 Defense and -1 Speed for each Wetland Legally Connected to this Ruin until end of turn.

cards.name: Gaslight Bogs
cards.ability: Combatants in this Ruin always deal Damage first, always deal at least 2 damage, and take twice the normally assigned damage.

cards.name: Bogling Stilt Village
cards.ability: All Bogling Minions in this Ruin gain: “If this Minion’s owner would sacrifice it to cast a Spell, deal one damage to it instead.”

cards.name: Shamic Alliance Outpost
cards.ability: Connection: When this Ruin Legally Connects with any non-Wetland Ruin this Ruin gains: “If a Combatant in this Ruin would die from Combat place it in it’s owner’s hand instead of the Discard Pile”

cards.name: Shamic Alliance Township
cards.ability: If this Ruin is Legally Connected to only Wetlands all effects triggered from a Hero or Minion dying in this Ruin are copied once.

cards.name: The Bleakest Reminder
cards.ability: If a Minion is sacrificed while in this Ruin it’s controller gains half of the Minion’s Echo Cost rounded down.

cards.name: Scenic Ridgetops
cards.ability: There may be up to 10 copies of this Ruin in your Explore Deck.

cards.name: Shattered Peaks
cards.ability: Dwarf Heroes and Minions in this Ruin gain Fortify and Blitz. Avian Heroes and Minion in this Ruin gain Caster and Blitz.

cards.name: Blackstone Valley Paths
cards.ability: This Ruin Legally Connects to all adjacent Mountain and River Ruins. Occupy Bonus: Gain Stealth until end of turn.

cards.name: Snow-Capped Plateau
cards.ability: Occupy Penalty: If Defense is less than 3, at the end of turn take 1 damage.

cards.name: Wind-Whipped Canyons
cards.ability:
Entry Penalty: Take 1 damage. 
If a Hero or Minion has Flying they gain +1 Attack and +1 Speed while in this Ruin.

cards.name: Linked Cragways
cards.ability: Entry Bonus: Gain Flanking until exiting this Ruin.

cards.name: Grandstone Watchpeaks
cards.ability: Avian Occupy Bonus: Gain +1 Movement, Charge, and may move into any adjacent Ruin, regardless of Legal Connections until end of turn.

cards.name: Grandstone Foundry-Works
cards.ability: Dwarf Occupy Bonus: Once during your Summoning Step you may sacrifice a Gear to search your Adventure Deck for a non-Mythical Gear with an equal or lower Echo cost and Equip it onto any of your Heroes or Minions.

cards.name: Gemflow Cliffside City
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: Each Relic in your Relic Hold may perform its Recharge ability one additional time.

cards.name: The Black Peaks
cards.ability: Occupy Bonus: Remove 1 Health Counter. This Hero or Minion receives +1 Attack, +1 Defense, and +1 Speed until it leaves play.

cards.name: Wide Burrows
cards.ability: There may be up to 10 copies of this Ruin in your Explore Deck.

cards.name: Echoing Warren
cards.sub_terrain: Entry Penalty: Loses Stealth until end of turn

cards.name: Glowshroom Paths
cards.ability: Occupy Penalty: Combatants in this Ruin always deal damage second regardless of Speed.

cards.name: Slopping Tunnelways
cards.ability: Exit Penalty: -1 Speed until end of turn.

cards.name: Twisted Cavern
cards.ability:
Entry Penalty: -1 Movement until end of turn. 
Exit Penalty: -1 Movement until end of turn.

cards.name: Concerning Descent-Shaft
cards.ability: Non-Dark Elf Heroes and Minions in this Ruin can not Enter and Exit this Ruin in the same turn.

cards.name: Central Fentla Expansion
cards.ability: Entry Bonus: +1 Defense until this Hero or Minion exits this Ruin.

cards.name: Western Fentla Basecamp
cards.ability: Entry Bonus: +1 Attack until this Hero or Minion exits this Ruin.

cards.name: Lyckal Settlement
cards.ability: Dark Elf Heroes and Minions in this Ruin gain Caster. If they have Range:1 they also gain +1 Range.

cards.name: The Cackling Chamber
cards.ability: If a Combatant with Caster would deal damage while in this Ruin it deals twice that amount of damage and 1 damage to itself.
